numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph shows opinions of different age groups about which country will develop the most in the future.
2. The graph shows opinions of different age groups about which country will develop the least in the future.
3. The age group 15-24 thinks that Indonesia will develop the most.
4. The age group 40 thinks that Indonesia will develop the most.
5. The age group 15-24 thinks that Mali will develop the least.
6. The age group 40 thinks that Mali will develop the least.
7. I guessed that the USA would be popular among people who are 15-24 years old.
8. The USA is known to the younger generation as a free country.
9. I think that the younger generation likes few limitations.
10. People who are 40 years old are adults.
11. I think that adults may think that few limitations for young people are not good.
12. I think that adults prefer religious countries.
13. I think that older people think more about their families.
14. Many religious people pray for individuals.
15. Many religious people pray for families.
16. Many religious people pray for states.
17. Many religious people pray for the nation.
18. Some people think that religion can improve health.
19. Some people think that religion can improve learning.
20. Some people think that religion can improve economic well-being.
21. Some people think that religion can improve self-control.
22. Some people think that religion can improve self-esteem.
23. Some people think that religion can improve empathy.
24. I wonder what in Indonesia makes younger people think that Indonesia will be better in the future.
25. I wonder what in Indonesia makes adults think that Indonesia will be better in the future.
26. This graph impacts me a lot.
27. I am 15-24 years old.
28. My home country is South Korea.
29. I think that South Korea is getting better.
30. The headline is: Which country might develop the most in the future?
